title: False Positive
author: Andy
citation: Andy. "False Positive: experience with DXM & Drug Testing (ID 73095)". Erowid.org. Aug 22, 2008. erowid.org/exp/73095
report: Eight hours after drinking a bottle of robitussin, I thought it would be fun to test myself with the At Home drug test from Walgreens. I was a little surprised to see that it showed me positive for opiates, so watch out.
